nodes.text: The Great Ungeness Trench was an underwater trench on the ocean-world Mon Cala. In 18 BBY, after the destruction of Dac City, Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Vader sunk to the trench, and faced a large creature.
The Great Ungeness Trench first appeared in Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 15, a 2018 canon comic written by Charles Soule and penciled by Giuseppe Camuncoli.
